--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster stood watching the night sky in his TM3
> panther mode, half letting himself enjoy the beauty,
> though deep down he viewed it as an indulgemce under
> the circumstances. He had understodd Primus' rationale
> for reviving him and totally agreed, not out of
> conceit, but out of a deep understanding that unless
> the finest warriors of all time stand together united
> as one race, they were doomed. There seemd to be a
> number of sparks who would make a worthy front line,
> but how to get in touch with Primus. Shadowcaster knew
> he could commune with other sparks only by locking
> onto strong emotions. How he'd be able to commune with
> Primusc when his current level of telepathy wwas so
> limited was beyond him, at least for a split second.
> 
> Deciding that his current form was the most compact
> way to navigate the Maximal base, he entered, then
> opened a channel to Rodimus. His tone grave and filled
> with grim determination.
> 
> "Rodimus, there is something of the utmost importance
> I must discuss with you."
> 
> 
>
